modern_subtext: Enjoy taking notes and writing texts in a modern UI
synchronize_subtext: And find all your notes on your web browser (also works with iPhone), your Android phone, and your desktop
note_list_empty: No notes to display, please start by creating a new one !
donation_message: This application was created for free, please, consider making a donation
fake_note_1: These fake notes will disappear as soon as you create a new note by selecting the bottom right button
fake_note_5: Format your notes and documents, add pictures and audio records
error_save: An error occured, please save your text and check it is not open in another tab
